text: The 2017–18 Liga IV Hunedoara is the 50th season of the Liga IV Hunedoara, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 2 September 2017 and ended on 2 June 2018. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Hunedoara=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Hunedoara * Dacia Orăștie ===From Liga IV Hunedoara=== Promoted to Liga III * — Relegated to Liga V Hunedoara * Metalul Crișcior ===Other changes=== * Cetate Deva II, CSM Vulcan and Gloria Geoagiu were enrolled in Liga IV due to the lack of teams. * Minerul Uricani was spared from relegation. ==League table== ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2017–18 Liga I * 2017–18 Liga II * 2017–18 Liga III * 2017–18 Liga IV ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2017–18 Liga IV Alba * 2017–18 Liga IV Arad * 2017–18 Liga IV Argeș * 2017–18 Liga IV Bihor * 2017–18 Liga IV Galați * 2017–18 Liga IV Mureș * 2017–18 Liga IV Olt * 2017–18 Liga IV Prahova * 2017–18 Liga IV Suceava * 2017–18 Liga IV Teleorman ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Liga IV seasons Category:Sport in Hunedoara County
title: 2017–18 Liga IV Hunedoara
